thread.title: Wencor Group And Wetmore Tool And Engineering Enter New Partnership
thread.title_full: Wencor Group And Wetmore Tool And Engineering Enter New Partnership - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Wencor Group And Wetmore Tool And Engineering Enter New Partnership
text:
Wencor Group
PEACHTREE CITY, Ga. and CHINO, Calif. , Aug. 31, California-based Wetmore Tool and Engineering announced its appointment of Wencor as its official inventory management partner worldwide. Under the new partnership, Wencor will provide precision cutting tool and fastener solutions for the global aerospace market including Asia , Europe and the Americas effective September 1, 2015 , expanding Wencor's existing tooling market capability.
"We are delighted with our appointment as Wetmore's global warehousing partner," said Rick Tonney , President of Wencor Distribution. "Wencor brings 60 years of world class experience in customer service, technical knowledge and operational capabilities to support the needs of the commercial aviation community, and we look forward to bringing Wetmore's unparalleled product offerings to our global customer base."
Andrew Pramschufer , CEO of Wetmore Tool and Engineering, commented, "Wetmore is always looking for solutions to ensure that we exceed our customers' expectations, and Wencor excels at fulfilling end-user requirements. We are excited about expanding our international market presence while enhancing our service levels via our new partnership with Wencor."
About Wencor Group
Wencor Group is a global aerospace industry leader that offers PMA design, CMM and DER repairs, and distribution solutions for airline operators, repair stations, manufacturers, and militaries around the world. Corporate affiliates include: Wencor, Aerospace Coatings International, Soundair Aviation Services, Flight Line Products, Xtra Aerospace, and Kitco Defense. Wencor Group is headquartered in the Atlanta metro area with locations in Utah , Amsterdam , Singapore , Beijing , Shanghai , Istanbul , Miami , Washington , Alabama , and Southern California . For more information, please visit www.wencorgroup.com .
About Wetmore Tool and Engineering
Wetmore is the world's leading precision cutting tool and fastener manufacturer and has been servicing the aerospace, fluid power, automotive, and industrial market segments since 1956.
